channel.title: Adding a requirement to a item
channel.description:
ok i know how to add it so that u need requirments to hold items ect..
but how do i make it so that u need a slayer requirement to hold a wep?

item.title: Adding a requirement to a item
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Go into your client.java and search ‘GetCLAttack’
Read that every time you see it. There’s like 3 declarations. You need to add it for slayer. The public int GetCLAttack - everything under it is the requirements.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding a requirement to a item
